en.title: SS Virgo 2 N Weekend Escape Cruise.
en.content: Congratulations to all Winners & Families of SS Virgo Cruise. Everybody had a great time!

meta.description: Congratulations to all Winners & Families of SS Virgo Cruise. Everybody had a great time!
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: FusionExcel Making Waves in Vientiane, Laos!

meta.description:
FE's Thai Country Licensee and Presidential Director Don Chan recently held an event at the 5 Star Don Chan Palace Hotel ( what a coincidence, Don,to have a hotel named after you ! ) in Vientiane, Laos on 15th August 2009. There were 700 attendees including many VIPs, high society people and doctors ( Dr Maneechan, Dr Buangem, Surgeon, Dr Weingsan, Anaesthetician, etc) . Everyone was impressed with the presentations and demos of FE's Quantum Pendant. There were sharings by Don Chan and FE Leaders. At the event 3 new Laotian FE Directors were presented with their certificates.
Congratulations, Don! It is great to see your network growing strongly overseas outside of Thailand. FE is truly a global platform for our Leaders !
AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
meta.author: klhunter
